data.eml:eml: Mollitrichosiphum Suenaga from China (Hemiptera: Aphididae), with the description of one new species

This dataset contains the digitized treatments in Plazi based on the original journal article Zhang, Dong, Qiao, Gexia (2010): Mollitrichosiphum Suenaga from China (Hemiptera: Aphididae), with the description of one new species. Zootaxa 2608: 1-24, DOI: 10.5281/zenodo.197753
